steps.title: Start the Game
steps.description: Tap 'Play Now' to begin your tennis dash adventure.

steps.title: Move & Dodge
steps.description: Swipe left or right to move your player and dodge incoming balls.

steps.title: Collect Powerups
steps.description: Grab powerups on the court to boost your speed and defense.

steps.title: Avoid Obstacles
steps.description: Watch out for tricky obstacles and spinning tennis machines.

steps.title: Score Points
steps.description: Hit targets and complete challenges to earn high scores.

steps.title: Compete & Improve
steps.description: Challenge friends, climb the leaderboard, and upgrade your gear.
